pullRequest.title: Issue #1405: Implemented tests for BillingController
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR is related to issue #1405 and contains tests implementation for BillingController

nodes.bodyText: Expected and actual objects should not be the same. Could you please correct this in other places too?
To my mind capture check is unnecessary here: you have already add mock call verification with argument. Mockito#verify would be enough.
